job_tasks.phrase: work on GenAI topics related to Case Management
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role involves understanding and applying GenAI concepts within the specific business domain of Case Management.

job_tasks.phrase: shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the strategic alignment of AI integration with business process improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements
job_tasks.justification: This directly points to the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.
job_tasks.justification: This shows the role operates within specific business and regulatory contexts.
While broad, this suggests the implementation or application of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions
job_tasks.justification: This implies designing and implementing solutions that are powered by AI, likely involving model application.

job_tasks.phrase: stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies
job_tasks.justification: This suggests a focus on learning and applying new AI models and techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This is a core software development task, building and maintaining applications on a specific platform (Pega).

job_tasks.phrase: implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of software development efforts.
This is a general outcome of software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies
design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes Pega development and business process integration with AI, rather than core AI model building or GenAI specific development. While GenAI is mentioned, the primary focus appears to be on applying existing AI capabilities within a Pega framework, making it lean towards a platform-focused developer role rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer.
